introduction: 找不到工作的外地男孩住在广州老城区，粤语的包围使他疏离隔绝，渐渐染上失眠。深夜在城市漫步的他发现一间彻夜营业的游戏机室，里面的一位本地女孩对他有莫名的吸力。不知如何与女孩建立联系的他，神差鬼使地拿走了女孩的录音日记。女孩的声音开始引导他深入这座雨林般的城市……In the city of Guangzhou, a young guy suffers from insomnia due to multiple misfits in resettling into a new place. One night he encounters a mysterious girl in particular yellow outfit at a local arcade whom he takes her recording headsets .The girl’s recordings guide him to rediscover the virtual and cultural beauty beneath the usual fabric of the city, he then begins to track this particular yellow outfit down…….
